maqras.text: Jadom asamana pata javega
Uha apane raba da hukama suna lavega ate usa la'i zaruri vi iho hai
Ate jadom dharati padhara kara diti javegi
Ate uha apane adara di'am cizam nu ugala devegi ate khali ho javegi
Ate uha apane raba da hukama suna lavegi ate uha isa de la'ika hai
He manukha! Tu apane palanahara vala khicada cali'a ja riha hai, phira tu usa nu milana vala hai
Tam jisa nu usa da karama patara (amala) usa de saje hatha vica dita javega
Usa tom asani nala hisaba li'a javega
Ate uha apane lokam de pasa khusi khusi avega
Ate jisa da karama patara (amala) usa di pitha ve pichi'um' dita javega
Uha mauta nu avazam marega
Ate naraka vica dakhila hovega
Uha apane lokam vica cita mukata rahida si
Usa ne samajhi'a si ki usa ne vapisa nahim jana
Ki'um nahim, usa da raba usa nu dekha riha si
Tam nahim, maim sahu khanda ham, saphaka (suraja phubana vele di lali) di
Ate rata di'am unham cizam di jinham nu uha sameta laindi hai
Ate cana di jadom uha pura ho jave
Ki tusim zarura ika daraje tom ba'ada duje daraje te pahucauge
Tam inham nu ki ho gi'a ki iha imana nahim li'a'unde
Ate jadom' unham de sahamane kura'ana parhi'a janda hai, tam uha alaha vala nahim jhukade
Sagom uha avagi'akari jhuthala rahe hana
Ate alaha janada hai jihara kujha uha ikatha kara rahe hana
So unham nu ika daradanaka saza di khusakhabari de devo
Paratu jihare loka imana li'a'e ate unham ne cage karama kite, unham la'i kade na khatama hona vala badala hai
Sahu hai burajam (tara madala) vale asamana di
Ate va'ade vale dina di
Ate dekhana vale di ate jihara dekhi'a gi'a
Nasa ho'e kha'i vale
Jinham vica bhatakade ho'e balana di aga si
Jadom ki uha usa te baithe ho'e sana
Ate jo kujha uha imana li'a'una vali'am nala kara rahe sana. Uha usa nu dekha rahe si
Ate unham nala usa da vaira isa tom bina hora kise karana nahim si, ki uha usa alaha upara imana li'a'e, jihara takatavara ate prasasa vala hai
Dharati ate asamanam vica usa da hi samaraja hai ate alaha hara ciza nu dekha riha hai
Jinham lokam ne momina maradam ate maumina auratam nu dukha dite, phira tauba na kiti, tam unham la'i naraka di saza hai
Ate unham la'i sarana di saza hai. Besaka jihare loka imana li'a'e ate cage karama kite, unham la'i (uha) baga hana, jinham de thale nahiram vagadi'am honagi'am ate iha vadi safalata hai
Besaka tere raba di pakara bari sakhata hai
Uha hi arabha karada hai ate uha hi duji vara ji'unda karega
Ate uha hi mu'afi dena vala hai. Prema karana vala hai
Uce sighasanam da malaka
Jo cahuda hai kara dida hai
Ki tuhanu phaujam di khabara puji hai
Phira'auna ate samuda di
Sagom iha avagi'akari jhuthala'una lage ho'e hana
Ate alaha ne usa nu care pasi'am tom gheri'a ho'i'a hai
Sagom uha ika goravasali kura'ana hai
Loha-e-mahiphuza vica likhi'a ho'i'a hai
Sahu hai, asamana vi ate rata nu pragata hona vale di
Ate tusi ki jano ki uha rata nu pragata hona vala ki hai
Camakila tara
Ko'i bada ajiha nahim hai jisa de upara nigarana na hove
Tam manukha nu dekhana cahida hai ki uha kisa ciza tom' paida kita gi'a hai
Uha ika uchalade ho'e pani tom paida kita gi'a hai
Jihara nikalada hai pitha ate chati de vicom
Besaka uha (alaha) usa nu mura janama dena di takata rakhada hai
Jisa dina gupata galam di parakha hovegi
Usa vele manukha de kola na ko'i bala hovega ate na ko'i saha'ika
Sahu hai asamana de cakara marana vale di
Ate phatana vali dharati di
Besaka iha paki gala hai
Ate iha mazaka di gala nahim
Iha hujatam karana vica lage ho'e hana
Ate mai' vi yojana bana'una vica lagi'a ho'i'a ham
Tam tusim avagi'akari'am nu kujha dhila devem, basa kujha dinam di hi dhila devo
